name: Coloring Game 4
description:
This is the last part of the Coloring Game’s franchise (coloring by numbers). The game’s fans are going to enjoy the improved functionality and a multitude of new images.
No more consecutive numbers are going to be given to the games within this franchise.

The game features 10 free images. Another 5 images are going to be added during the game’s full release.
Coloring Game 4 is not going to feature image animation.

Following the players’ numerous requests, commercial DLCs are going to be unified (400,000 px.).
